segment.source: Changing the Frequency of UE-V Scheduled Tasks
segment.target: Changing the Frequency of UE-V Scheduled Tasks

segment.source: Changing the Frequency of UE-V Scheduled Tasks
segment.target: Changing the Frequency of UE-V Scheduled Tasks

segment.source: Changing the Frequency of UE-V Scheduled Tasks
segment.target: Changing the Frequency of UE-V Scheduled Tasks

segment.source: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) Agent installer, AgentSetup.exe, creates two scheduled tasks during the UE-V Agent installation.
segment.target: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) Agent installer, AgentSetup.exe, creates two scheduled tasks during the UE-V Agent installation.

segment.source: The two tasks are the Template Auto Update task and the Setting Storage Location Status task.
segment.target: The two tasks are the Template Auto Update task and the Setting Storage Location Status task.

segment.source: These scheduled tasks are not configurable with the UE-V tools.
segment.target: These scheduled tasks are not configurable with the UE-V tools.

segment.source: Administrators who wish to change the scheduled task for these items can create a script that uses the Schtasks.exe command-line options.
segment.target: Administrators who wish to change the scheduled task for these items can create a script that uses the Schtasks.exe command-line options.

segment.source: For more information about Schtasks.exe, see How to use Schtasks,exe to Schedule Tasks in Windows Server 2003.
segment.target: For more information about Schtasks.exe, see How to use Schtasks,exe to Schedule Tasks in Windows Server 2003.

segment.source: Template Auto-Update
segment.target: Template Auto-Update

segment.source: The Template Auto Update task checks the settings template catalog for new, updated, or removed templates.
segment.target: The Template Auto Update task checks the settings template catalog for new, updated, or removed templates.

segment.source: This task only runs if the SettingsTemplateCatalog is configured.
segment.target: This task only runs if the SettingsTemplateCatalog is configured.

segment.source: The Template Auto Update task runs the ApplySettingsCatalog.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent install directory.
segment.target: The Template Auto Update task runs the ApplySettingsCatalog.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent install directory.

segment.source: Task name
segment.target: Task name

segment.source: Default trigger
segment.target: Default trigger

segment.source: \Microsoft\UE-V\Template Auto Update
segment.target: \Microsoft\UE-V\Template Auto Update

segment.source: 3:30 AM every day
segment.target: 3:30 AM every day

segment.source: Example: The following command configures the agent to check the settings template catalog store every hour.
segment.target: Example: The following command configures the agent to check the settings template catalog store every hour.

segment.source: Settings Storage Location Status
segment.target: Settings Storage Location Status

segment.source: The Setting Storage Location Status task performs the following actions:
segment.target: The Setting Storage Location Status task performs the following actions:

segment.source: Checks to make sure the UE-V folders are still pinned or registered with the offline files feature.
segment.target: Checks to make sure the UE-V folders are still pinned or registered with the offline files feature.

segment.source: Checks whether the settings storage location is offline or online.
segment.target: Checks whether the settings storage location is offline or online.

segment.source: Forces a synchronization on the specified interval instead of the default interval for offline files.
segment.target: Forces a synchronization on the specified interval instead of the default interval for offline files.

segment.source: Synchronizes any settings packages that are configured to be pre-fetched.
segment.target: Synchronizes any settings packages that are configured to be pre-fetched.

segment.source: Checks if the Active Directory home directory path has changed.
segment.target: Checks if the Active Directory home directory path has changed.

segment.source: Writes the current settings storage configuration under the following location
segment.target: Writes the current settings storage configuration under the following location

segment.source: Task name
segment.target: Task name

segment.source: Default trigger
segment.target: Default trigger

segment.source: \Microsoft\UE-V\Settings Storage Location Status
segment.target: \Microsoft\UE-V\Settings Storage Location Status

segment.source: At logon of any user – After triggered, repeat every 30 minutes indefinitely.
segment.target: At logon of any user – After triggered, repeat every 30 minutes indefinitely.

segment.source: Example: The following command configures the agent to run the action above every hour.
segment.target: Example: The following command configures the agent to run the action above every hour.
